FM meets UNDP president representative
     Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, Foreign Minister of the  Democratic People's Republic of Korea, today met and conversed with the outgoing resident coordinator of the United Nations and concurrently resident representative of the UNDP in the DPRK, Christian Lemaire.
